execution_plan.description: Count number of products per category name in the store_main database (include categories with zero products).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT c.name AS name, COUNT(p.id) AS categories_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p ON p.category_id = c.id
GROUP BY c.name;

execution_plan.description: Count number of items per product group name in the store_alt database (include groups with zero items).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT pg.group_name AS name, COUNT(i.code) AS groups_count
FROM product_groups pg
LEFT JOIN items i ON i.group_ref = pg.gid
GROUP BY pg.group_name;
